Original title: Vanishing Point
Release Date: 1971
Director: Richard Sarafian
Screenplay: Guillermo Cabrera Infante
Music: VVAA
Starring: Barry Newman, Dean Jagger, Cleavon Little
Studio: 20th Century-Fox

Synopsis:
---------------
"Kowalski, a veteran of Vietnam, is collecting and delivering cars between Denver and San Francisco. Recalling his former profession of pilot fireballs, your car will be launched with enormous speed, pursued by police. In his career is helped by a "disc-jockey" that is oriented from a transmitter and warning him of those dangers threaten him. The flight will serve to refresh the memories of his former life. "
